summary: This document appears to be a personnel list or organizational chart for Jeffrey Epstein's operations, detailing roles for his private airline (TWA) and his estate (LSJE - Little St. James Estate). It names pilots, managers, boat captains, housekeepers, landscapers, maintenance staff, and flight escorts associated with Epstein's properties and travel.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the 'Principle' at the top of the personnel/organizational chart for TWA and LSJE operations.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Identified as the Head Pilot for Epstein's private airline, TWA, and also listed as an LSJE employee.

persons.name: William Di Mauro
persons.context: Identified as an Assistant Pilot for TWA and also listed as an LSJE employee.

persons.name: Ann M. Rodriquez
persons.context: Listed as a Manager for LSJE (Little St. James Estate) and also referenced as a manager in the escort section.

persons.name: Danny Vicars
persons.context: Listed as an LSJE employee; appears twice in the list.

persons.name: Carlos Rodriguez
persons.context: Listed as an LSJE employee and also identified as one of the 'LSJE Escort(s)'.

persons.name: Ramon Linderman
persons.context: Listed as an LSJE employee and also identified as one of the 'LSJE Escort(s)'.

connections.description: Epstein is listed as the 'Principle' and Visoski as the 'TWA Head Pilot', indicating an employment relationship.
Epstein is the principle and Rodriquez is listed as an LSJE Manager, indicating an employment relationship.
Both are listed as pilots for TWA, with Visoski as Head Pilot and Di Mauro as Assistant Pilot.
Both are listed as LSJE employees and also identified as 'LSJE Escort(s)'.
Both are listed as managers, Rodriquez for LSJE and Romney for VIPA, suggesting professional interaction in the context of Epstein's operations.

locations: Cyril E. King Airport - St. Thomas
Thomas World Air Hanger - Jet Center STT
St. Thomas Jet Center FBO (Fixed Base Operation)
keyFacts: The document provides a detailed organizational structure of staff working for Jeffrey Epstein's private airline (TWA) and his private estate (LSJE - Little St. James Estate).
It lists specific roles including pilots, managers, boat captains, housekeepers, landscapers, maintenance staff, and notably, 'flight escorts'.
Individuals like Carlos Rodriguez and Ramon Linderman are listed both as general LSJE employees and specifically as 'LSJE Escort(s)', indicating a dual role.
The list connects Epstein's air travel operations (TWA, based at Cyril E. King Airport) directly with the staffing of his private island estate (LSJE).
It shows coordination with local port authority (VIPA) through manager Roy Romney.
